infos.value: The time has come.
With you two and the combined might of Leonis on our side, victory is all but assured.
Viktora... About Mont and his soldiers...
What, are you worried?
Fennes is afoot. Leonis and Hourne now hail to each other... And the Church's shadow looms ever in the background, only seen in glimpses...
In such troubled times, I worry that Mont and his party may be stretched too thinly to support our cause.
Are we asking too much of them?
Hahaha. You're a kind one, Glaciela.
I understand that feeling of uneasiness all too well.
But listen to me.
The two of you are engaged, correct?
...Right.
If so, then Mont should be just as anxious about the break of dawn as you are.
To see his betrothed overthrow Khury and take the throne...
Be sure to invite both me and Luartha to the wedding, won't you?
Oh, yes! We'll dress up nicely for your big day.
...I will!
If that's settled, we shall return to Wezette Castle.
Huh!?
You won't be departing from here with us on the morrow?
For now, we will continue to play the part of Wezette's guests.
If we're not seen at the castle, it could rouse suspicions.
As she says.
Moreover, dealing with Khury himself will be the most dreadful ordeal of this battle.
Right. That bow of his poses quite the threat.
That would put us in the perfect position to stop him, don't you think?
Could I...ask that of you?
Of course. What else are friends for?
Tomorrow morning, we'll spring into action the moment you descend upon the castle.
The castle gates will open once we and Mont's party lay waste to those within.
...All right?
Yes!
